attributes.action: Require all electrical installations to be carried out by qualified electricians
attributes.background: The Government should require all electrical installations to be carried out by a qualified electrician, in line with BS7671 regulations. This would put electrical installations more on a par with existing gas safety regulations.

departments.name: Department for Business, Energy and Industrial Strategy
